records.Name: Hull and Support-Systems Maintenance
records.Description: Contains small fixed on hull and life-support systems as well as non-critical internal systems.

records.Name: Battle-Damage Ship Repair
records.Description: Repair of crucial structural damage on hull, engines and weapon systems.

records.Name: Engine Maintenance
records.Description: Standard maintenance for all engines, not including jumps.

records.Name: Flight Maneuver Training: Beginner
records.Description: Basic maneuvers for rookies. No pre-requisites!

records.Name: Flight Maneuver Training: Intermediate
records.Description: Building on the basic maneuvers also includes weapon usage during fights.
